#summary The font-family property is a prioritized list of font family names, including generic font families.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *font-family*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `[ <family-name> || <generic-family> ] [, <family-name> || <generic-family>]* ]`
  * `inherit`

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
